text: Dardic is a group of Indo-Aryan languages spoken in the Dardistan region of Pakistan, Afghanistan, and India. == List of Dardic languages == #Shina #Kashmiri #Chitrali language #Pashayi #Torwali #Palula #Indus Kohistani #Gawar-Bati #Ushoji #Kalami #Kalasha #Sawi #Dameli #Kalkoti #Chilisso #Kohistani Shina #Shumashti #Dardiarya/Brokskat #Gowro #Domaaki #Bateri Category:Language families of Pakistan
title: Dardic languages
